name: Brutal Castle | FREE DEMO
description:
Brutal Castle - is an epic beat'em up about powerful fire-breathing Living Castle which outrageously fights against Godzilla like monsters to survive in a cruel medieval world of the war of all against all!

SPECIAL FEATURES: 

- Action in every pixel!

- Ultra satisfying combat mechanics!

- New abilities for the player and enemies on every level!

- Battles With Dangerous Bosses!

- Awesome Heavy Metal Soundtracks!

Be one of the first to try the demo now!

Want to support this project? You can donate some money and we will add gamepad controls in the release version of the game!
